title: 2018 adc????
body:
Actually, RIP ADC 2018. In 8.11, no one is using marksman at bot anymore, in 8.12, riot even nerf ez and kaisa,  nerf Supp item and supp, do they want to destroy this game? see Korean server now, YAS ADC is the most 'traditional' one at bot line??????

THEY STILL NOT GONNA TO ANY CHANGE

replies.body:
> THEY STILL NOT GONNA TO ANY CHANGE

You heard it here first kids. Riot are not gonna to any change.
